description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾担任第43任美国总统。
description.en: American politician who served as the 43rd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首、政府首脑与三军统帅。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 美国德克萨斯州的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the U.S. state of Texas.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什任内担任副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as Vice President under George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第42任美国总统，是乔治·沃克·布什的前任。
description.en: American politician, the 42nd President of the United States, and the predecessor of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第44任美国总统，是乔治·沃克·布什的继任者。
description.en: American politician, the 44th President of the United States, and the successor to George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任德克萨斯州州长，在1994年选举中被乔治·沃克·布什击败。
description.en: American politician who served as Governor of Texas and was defeated by George W. Bush in the 1994 election.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什担任德州州长期间任副州长，后接任州长。
description.en: American politician who served as Lieutenant Governor under George W. Bush in Texas and later succeeded him as governor.

description.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州的一座城市，是乔治·沃克·布什的出生地。
description.en: A city in Connecticut, USA, and the birthplace of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什的妻子，曾任美国第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of George W. Bush and former First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第41任美国总统，是乔治·沃克·布什的父亲。
description.en: American politician, the 41st President of the United States, and the father of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什的母亲，曾任美国第一夫人。
description.en: Mother of George W. Bush and former First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任佛罗里达州州长，是乔治·沃克·布什的弟弟。
description.en: American politician, former Governor of Florida, and the younger brother of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国康涅狄格州纽黑文的私立研究型大学，是乔治·沃克·布什的母校。
description.en: A private research university in New Haven, Connecticut, and the alma mater of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥的私立研究型大学，是乔治·沃克·布什的母校。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, and the alma mater of George W. Bush.

nodes.id: 德克萨斯州空军国民警卫队

zh-cn: 德克萨斯州空军国民警卫队

description.zh-cn: 美国德克萨斯州的空中民兵，是美国空军的预备役部队。
description.en: The air militia of the State of Texas, and a reserve component of the United States Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 2001年在美国发生的一系列恐怖袭击事件，深刻影响了乔治·沃克·布什的总统任期。
description.en: A series of terrorist attacks in the United States in 2001 that profoundly impacted the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 由美国及其盟友为应对九一一袭击事件而发起的一场全球性军事、政治、法律和意识形态斗争。
description.en: A global military, political, legal, and ideological struggle launched by the United States and its allies in response to the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 作为反恐战争的一部分，由美国发动的旨在推翻塔利班政权并铲除基地组织的军事行动。
description.en: As part of the War on Terror, a military operation launched by the United States to overthrow the Taliban regime and eliminate al-Qaeda.

description.zh-cn: 一个在阿富汗活动的伊斯兰原教旨主义运动组织，在2001年阿富汗战争中被美国推翻。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist movement in Afghanistan, which was overthrown by the United States in the 2001 War in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 一个由奥萨马·本·拉登创立的伊斯兰军事组织，被指控策划了九一一袭击事件。
description.en: An Islamic military organization founded by Osama bin Laden, accused of masterminding the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 由美国及其盟友发动的军事行动，旨在推翻萨达姆·侯赛因政权。
description.en: A military operation launched by the United States and its allies to overthrow the regime of Saddam Hussein.

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克前总统，其政权在2003年伊拉克战争中被推翻。
description.en: Former President of Iraq whose regime was overthrown in the 2003 Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，在布什任内加入了世界贸易组织。
description.en: A country in East Asia that joined the World Trade Organization during the Bush administration.

description.zh-cn: 一个负责监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 美国第55届总统选举，乔治·沃克·布什成功连任。
description.en: The 55th U.S. presidential election, in which George W. Bush was successfully re-elected.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2004年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人被乔治·沃克·布什击败。
description.en: American politician who, as the Democratic candidate, was defeated by George W. Bush in the 2004 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国第54届总统选举，乔治·沃克·布什当选总统。
description.en: The 54th U.S. presidential election, in which George W. Bush was elected president.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2000年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人被乔治·沃克·布什击败。
description.en: American politician who, as the Democratic candidate, was defeated by George W. Bush in the 2000 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党政治顾问，曾担任乔治·沃克·布什的总统顾问。
description.en: American Republican political consultant who served as a presidential advisor to George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2000年共和党总统初选中被乔治·沃克·布什击败。
description.en: American politician who was defeated by George W. Bush in the 2000 Republican presidential primaries.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家和退役四星上将，在乔治·沃克·布什的第一任期内担任国务卿。
description.en: American politician and retired four-star general who served as Secretary of State during George W. Bush's first term.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什任内担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of Defense under George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国最高法院对2000年总统选举佛罗里达州计票争议的裁决，该裁决使乔治·沃克·布什当选总统。
description.en: The U.S. Supreme Court ruling on the Florida vote recount controversy in the 2000 presidential election, which resulted in George W. Bush becoming president.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家和外交官，在乔治·沃克·布什的第二任期内担任国务卿。
description.en: American politician and diplomat who served as Secretary of State during George W. Bush's second term.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，接替拉姆斯菲尔德，在乔治·沃克·布什任内担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who succeeded Rumsfeld as Secretary of Defense under George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国历史上最严重的自然灾害之一，布什政府因救灾不力而备受批评。
description.en: One of the worst natural disasters in U.S. history; the Bush administration was heavily criticized for its response.

description.zh-cn: 由乔治·沃克·布什政府推动的教育改革法案。
description.en: An education reform act promoted by the George W. Bush administration.

description.zh-cn: 基地组织的首领，被认为是九一一袭击事件的主谋。
description.en: Leader of al-Qaeda, considered the mastermind of the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在减缓全球变暖的国际协议，布什政府退出了该协议。
description.en: An international treaty aimed at curbing global warming, from which the Bush administration withdrew.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国前最高领导人，被布什政府列为“邪恶轴心”之一。
description.en: Former supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, labeled as part of the "Axis of Evil" by the Bush administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前最高领导人，曾与乔治·沃克·布什会面。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China who met with George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦民族权力机构主席，曾与乔治·沃克·布什会面。
description.en: President of the Palestinian National Authority who met with George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 以色列前总理，曾与乔治·沃克·布什会面。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Israel who met with George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦前领导人，被布什政府谴责和抵制。
description.en: Former Palestinian leader who was condemned and boycotted by the Bush administration.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相，与乔治·沃克·布什保持着密切的合作关系。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom who maintained a close working relationship with George W. Bush.

nodes.id: 弗拉基米尔·阿鲁丘尼扬

zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·阿鲁丘尼扬

description.zh-cn: 格鲁吉亚人，曾试图用手榴弹暗杀乔治·沃克·布什但未遂。
description.en: A Georgian man who attempted to assassinate George W. Bush with a hand grenade.

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克记者，曾在记者会上向乔治·沃克·布什扔鞋以示抗议。
description.en: An Iraqi journalist who threw his shoes at George W. Bush during a press conference in protest.

description.zh-cn: 美国前首席大法官，曾主持乔治·沃克·布什的连任就职典礼。
description.en: Former Chief Justice of the United States who administered the oath of office for George W. Bush's second inauguration.

description.zh-cn: 美国现任首席大法官，由乔治·沃克·布什提名。
description.en: Current Chief Justice of the United States, nominated by George W. Bush.

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国的最高联邦法院。
description.en: The highest federal court in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于2001年至2009年担任第43任美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush served as the 43rd President of the United States from 2001 to 2009.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1995年至2000年担任第46任德克萨斯州州长。
description.en: George W. Bush served as the 46th Governor of Texas from 1995 to 2000.

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 迪克·切尼在乔治·沃克·布什的两个总统任期内担任副总统。
description.en: Dick Cheney served as Vice President during both of George W. Bush's presidential terms.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什接替比尔·克林顿成为美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush succeeded Bill Clinton as President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 巴拉克·奥巴马接替乔治·沃克·布什成为美国总统。
description.en: Barack Obama succeeded George W. Bush as President of the United States.

relationships.target: 德克萨斯州空军国民警卫队

description.zh-cn: 九一一袭击事件促使乔治·沃克·布什政府发动了全球性的反恐战争。
description.en: The September 11 attacks prompted the George W. Bush administration to launch a global War on Terror.

description.zh-cn: 为应对九一一袭击事件，布什发动了阿富汗战争以推翻塔利班政权并铲除基地组织。
description.en: In response to the 9/11 attacks, Bush launched the War in Afghanistan to overthrow the Taliban regime and eliminate al-Qaeda.

description.zh-cn: 布什政府以萨达姆政权拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由，发动了伊拉克战争。
description.en: The Bush administration launched the Iraq War, citing the Saddam regime's possession of weapons of mass destruction.

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克战争推翻了萨达姆·侯赛因的政权。
description.en: The Iraq War overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein.

description.zh-cn: 布什政府支持并帮助中国大陆于2001年加入世界贸易组织。
description.en: The Bush administration supported and facilitated mainland China's entry into the World Trade Organization in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 在充满争议的2000年美国总统选举中击败民主党候选人艾尔·戈尔。
description.en: Defeated Democratic candidate Al Gore in the controversial 2000 U.S. presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年美国总统选举中击败民主党候选人约翰·克里，成功连任。
description.en: Defeated Democratic candidate John Kerry in the 2004 U.S. presidential election to win re-election.

description.zh-cn: 美国最高法院在“布什诉戈尔案”中的判决，停止了佛罗里达州的重新计票，使得布什赢得了2000年总统选举。
description.en: The U.S. Supreme Court's decision in Bush v. Gore stopped the Florida recount, resulting in George W. Bush winning the 2000 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 布什政府对飓风卡特里娜的救灾工作处置不当，使其支持度遭遇众多批评并出现下滑。
description.en: The Bush administration's handling of the Hurricane Katrina disaster relief efforts faced widespread criticism and led to a decline in his approval ratings.

description.zh-cn: 布什上任后积极筹措并签署了“不让任何孩子落后”教育法案。
description.en: After taking office, Bush actively prepared and signed the No Child Left Behind education act.

description.zh-cn: 布什政府撤回了美国对《京都议定书》的支持，并拒绝签署该协议。
description.en: The Bush administration withdrew U.S. support for the Kyoto Protocol and refused to sign it.

description.zh-cn: 布什将朝鲜及其领导人金正日称为“邪恶轴心”的一部分。
description.en: Bush labeled North Korea and its leader Kim Jong-il as part of the "Axis of Evil".

description.zh-cn: 布什与时任英国首相托尼·布莱尔保持亲密的合作关系和个人友谊，尤其是在反恐战争和伊拉克战争期间。
description.en: Bush maintained a close working relationship and personal friendship with then-British Prime Minister Tony Blair, particularly during the War on Terror and the Iraq War.

relationships.source: 弗拉基米尔·阿鲁丘尼扬

description.zh-cn: 2005年5月10日，阿鲁丘尼扬在格鲁吉亚向布什的演讲台扔掷了一枚手榴弹，试图暗杀他，但手榴弹未爆炸。
description.en: On May 10, 2005, Arutinian threw a hand grenade towards the podium where Bush was speaking in Georgia in an assassination attempt, but the grenade failed to detonate.

description.zh-cn: 2008年12月14日，在伊拉克的一场记者会上，扎伊迪向布什扔掷鞋子以示抗议。
description.en: On December 14, 2008, during a press conference in Iraq, al-Zaidi threw his shoes at Bush in protest.

description.zh-cn: 提名约翰·罗伯茨担任美国最高法院首席大法官。
description.en: Nominated John Roberts to be Chief Justice of the United States Supreme Court.

position.en: Chief Justice of the United States
